explanation:
code_hardening: Added null and empty-string checks to avoid NullPointerException and unnecessary processing; used a final array for prefixes to prevent accidental modification.
resolve_compilation_errors: Removed all dependencies on undefined helpers (hasSuffix, NewString, measure) and introduced a self-contained stripPrefixes method compatible with the existing call graph (stripAffixes -> stripPrefixes).
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Replaced suffix-based stemming logic with prefix matching using String.startsWith; on the first matching prefix from the fixed list (kilo, micro, milli, intra, ultra, mega, nano, pico, pseudo), the prefix is stripped and the remainder returned immediately; if no match is found, the original string is returned unchanged.
refactoring: Renamed and implemented the method as stripPrefixes to reflect its true purpose; simplified control flow by eliminating morphological conditions and nested checks.
misc: Added brief inline comments and formatted code to be consistent with the surrounding codebase style; no new custom API calls were introduced.
